resources.string: Enter a bid for all players
Enter a trick count for all players

----------------------------------------------
 Please enter your message above this line.

If the last person to bid also has the highest score on the score sheet (not tied), they cannot bid a number that would cause the total number of tricks bid to equal the total number of tricks in the round.
The last person to bid cannot bid a number that would cause the total number of tricks bid to equal the total number of tricks in the round.
Rather than increasing the number of tricks in a round until the final round, the number of tricks only increases to a specified number, then decreases back to one.
Would you like to see your favourite house rule added? Let me know how it works and I\'ll do my best!
Unable to save setting. Please try again.
I develop this app in my spare time. Because it\'s both free and ad-free, I make no money from it. If you\'ve enjoyed using it and want to show your appreciation, I would be very grateful.
Found a bug? Have a suggestion? Just want to say hi? Feel free to reach out!
Include device information (please leave enabled if you\'re reporting a bug)
Error starting game. Please try again.
The number of tricks bid is not allowed to equal the total number of bids in the round. The dealer must change their bid.
The number of tricks bid is not allowed to equal the total number of bids in the round when the dealer is in the lead. The dealer must change their bid.
Would you like to save your game?
You cannot bid more than the number of tricks in the round.
